<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Harmonic Hauberk](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1380)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 84

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Rose gold and copper rings in this _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_ form a vague bird shape. The jingling links tinkle musically, almost like birdsong. While you wear the armor, effects with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait must first [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the _harmonic hauberk_ or they have no effect on you.

 The _harmonic hauberk_ attempts to counteract [_silence_](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) spells cast on you and 4th-level or higher heightened _silence_ spells the first time the armor enters their area (counteract level 4, counteract modifier +20). After failing to counteract a _silence_ spell, the armor can't attempt to counteract the same spell again, even if you leave and enter the spell's area multiple times.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** You have a pool of Focus Points and at least one [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=31) spell; **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point and immediately use the Focus Point to cast [_lingering composition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=389), using your [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check to determine the effects of the spell, followed by the [_inspire defense_](/Spells.aspx?ID=387) composition cantrip. You can use this activation to cast those spells even if you don't have the [Lingering Composition](/Feats.aspx?ID=180) or [Inspire Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=188) feats.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Harmonic Hauberk
